text: Egh a igharaz darazi arazir kurabar me damuan aghuagham. Egh gumazir igharazibar biziba okɨman aghuagham. Egh a uan namakamɨn amamangatɨzɨ, a pura ada dagɨar taba inigh, eghtɨ namakam ua da ikarvaghamin ababanim inian aghuagham. Egh gumazir aghuir kam, mɨtiriaba azir darasi, a dagheba isɨ me danɨngam. Egh korotiaba puvatɨzir darasi, a korotiaba isɨ me danɨngam.
